featured.title: Dream Journal App
featured.subtitle: AI-Powered Dream Analysis
featured.description: A React + Node.js application that helps users log, track, and interpret their dreams using AI.
featured.longDescription: This full-stack application revolutionizes dream journaling by combining psychological insights with AI interpretation.
